title: Rajma (Red kidney bean curry)
ingredients: ['450g (16 oz) red kidney beans', '1/4 teaspoon turmeric', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '5cm piece fresh root ginger, minced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '3 tomatoes, chopped', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '2 teaspoons garam masala', '2 teaspoons ground coriander', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/4 teaspoon asafoetida', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh coriander']
